comment.body: @猫叉酱（小号）: DVDs degrade over time. They are not good for backup. https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Disc_rot

@Citycourt: I take that back; according to this study for the Library of Congress, https://www.loc.gov/preservation/scientists/projects/cd-r_dvd-r_rw_longevity.html 

If you store them in a cool (<= 25 Celsius) and dry (<50% humidity) DVDs should last about 30 years.
